name: Phantom 8 - Counter Terrorist Unit
description:
________________________________________________________

Phantom 8 is an organization founded by the Canadian Department of Defence with the goal of protecting worldwide nations from uprising terrorism. 8 of the founding members consist of: The United States of America, Canada, United Kingdom, France, Italy, Spain, Germany & Belgium. Currently there are 150+ nations who have signed a defense pact with P8, therefore letting the special forces of the above-mentioned nations to freely deploy and conduct operations in their land.

________________________________________________________

This 1-level demo lets you play as an Italian operator being deployed in Greece during a terrorist attack at an official hotel in Florina at 9: 30 PM, attackers' identities currently unknown. It was reported that they went to Greece from North Macedonia using military-grade vehicles, which gives us a conclusion: They were not acting alone.

________________________________________________________

This game was heavily inspired by the first Ghost Recon and Rainbow Six titles.

________________________________________________________
